page.title: 20LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN TOTTON
page.content: We walked around part of Totton to find out what people do in their spare time and where they go. A lot of people went to Southampton. They all said that the facilities for young people in Totton are very poor. But there are a few things like youth clubs. Several people go to pubs like the Old Farm House. The older people go to the Three Score Club or the Over Sixties Club. _______________ All screen pages are the work of class 13JO at Hounsdown School. The amenity count data was surveyed by class 14SK.Written material was edited by Chris Bull, Head of Geography at the school. Computer data entry supervision was by Mike Whitcher. We would like to thank all those who supplied information and assisted us in particular Mr. Mac. Davidson.
